overview_of_class: This course will investigate fundamental issues raised by the theory and practice of the three great monotheistic religions: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam. Among the questions to be addressed are: What is God? Can one prove the existence of God? Is there an inherent conflict between faith and reason? If God is all good, why do we experience evil? Is there any way we can overcome the lure of sin? What does it mean to love God?
name: Philosophy of Religion
subject: PHIL
